nodes.text: The Lesser Plooroid Cluster was a star cluster located in the Mid Rim. Urce Space and the Ottega sector lay in the cluster.
Hyperlanes used to travel through the Lesser Plooriod Cluster included Burna Trade Route and Entana Run.
During the Rebellion era, High Inquisitor Mox Slosin patrolled the cluster unsupervised, looking for Rebel activity.
